title: List of all Android speech recognition  libraries for use in your project
meta: See collection of all Android speech recognition  libraries, filter by license, modified date, languages, and select best for your usecase.

repoList.name: vosk-android-demo
repoList.description: Offline speech recognition for Android with Vosk library.

repoList.name: DroidSpeech
repoList.description: Android library for continuous speech recognition

repoList.name: Android-Speech-Recognition
repoList.description: Continuous speech recognition library for Android with options to use GoogleVoiceIme dialog and offline mode.

repoList.name: RapidSphinx
repoList.description: Android library for offline speech recognition base on Pocketsphinx engine. Add speech recognition feature into your Android app with easier implementations.

repoList.name: DroidSpeech2.0
repoList.description: Android kotlin library for continuous speech recognition with localisations.

repoList.name: unity3DPocketSphinx-android-lib
repoList.description: This is a library that uses CMU Sphinx speech recognition engine, that is used in Unity3D.

repoList.name: OfflineSpeechRecognition
repoList.description: Offline Speech Recognition For Android Library

repoList.name: Siri-Clone-for-Android
repoList.description: This Android app is basically a personal assistant for you the same way Siri is on the iPhone. I used the speech to text library from api.ai for the speech recognition necessary for this app. I made this app as a personal challenge to finish a project in 1 week over spring break.

repoList.name: AndroidSpeechRecognition
repoList.description: Basic speech recognition which uses the built-in Android library.

repoList.name: AndroidSpeechRecognitionLib
repoList.description: Test for Android Speech Recognition to be used in Unity as .jar library

repoList.description: Offline speech recognition for Android with Vosk library.
